TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HttpServerUtilityWrapper extends System.Web.HttpServerUtilityBase

summary.span: 封裝 HTTP 內建物件，這個物件提供協助程式方法以處理 Web 要求。

span.span: Encapsulates the HTTP intrinsic object that provides helper methods for processing Web requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別衍生自類別，並可做為包裝函式類別。The class derives from the class and serves as a wrapper for the class. 這個類別會公開的功能類別時一併公開型別。This class exposes the functionality of the class while also exposing the type. 類別可讓您取代的原始實作並用自訂的實作，例如，當您執行單元測試的 ASP.NET 管線外部的應用程式中的類別。The class enables you to replace the original implementation of the class in your application with a custom implementation, such as when you perform unit testing outside the ASP.NET pipeline.

MemberSignature.Value: public HttpServerUtilityWrapper (System.Web.HttpServerUtility httpServerUtility);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Web.HttpServerUtility httpServerUtility) cil managed
public: HttpServerUtilityWrapper(System::Web::HttpServerUtility ^ httpServerUtility);
new System.Web.HttpServerUtilityWrapper : System.Web.HttpServerUtility -> System.Web.HttpServerUtilityWrapper

param.name: httpServerUtility
param.span: 由這個包裝函式提供存取的物件。

span.span: The object that this wrapper class provides access to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `output`參數由參考傳遞至方法。The `output` parameter is passed by reference to the method. 若要在方法完成之後，請從處理常式擷取輸出，您使用的屬性和方法`output`物件。To retrieve the output from the handler after the method completes, you use the properties and methods of the `output` object. 如需範例，請參閱 。For an example, see .
